short_summary: Shared Services Canada ", "  Solutions-Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement "-Domains of Expertise- Business Transformation ", "  Strategic Advisory Services
description: This requirement is open only to those SBIPS EN537-05IT01. Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 2 for services in the National Capital Region for the following Domains of Expertise – Business Transformation
duration_in_months: The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language. The current contract value is 20,057,500.00 and it ends on July 29, 2023. The contract period is three years, plus two option periods of one year each. The current incumbent is PricewaterhouseCoopers.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
full_summary:
